gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Mia Chen
Age: 17
Physical appearance: Petite build, pale skin, shoulder-length messy black hair with blue dyed tips. Large expressive eyes with dark circles.
Visual details: OUTFIT: Oversized bright yellow hoodie (signature color), BOTTOM: Black pleated skirt with sheer black tights, FOOTWEAR: Chunky black combat boots, ACCESSORY: Large white noise-canceling headphones around neck or on ears, MOTIF: Water droplets appearing on her skin when ghosts are near
Personality (for expression): Introverted, anxious, observant, but fiercely brave when cornered.
